short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables dialling phone numbers on websites with a right click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome browser extension for https://NoTyping.net service.

Please note that you will need a valid trial / paid subscription to use this extension. If you don't have one, sign up now on https://NoTyping.net to got a 1 day free trial. 

How To use this extension:
1. Install the extension in chrome browser
2. Click on the extension to show login popup
3. Login with your NoTyping.net credentials
4. Login with the same credentials on the accompanying mobile app
5. Now enjoy super fast dialing: Right click on any mobile/telephone number on any website and click on "Call Now" option in the context menu to initiate the call.
